title: Bittersweet Homecoming
description: Book 2 in the Lawyers in Love series One hot weekend eight years ago was all they had before Gray was captured on assignment and presumed dead. Andi moved on, made a good life for herself and their son... until Gray returned, a battered warrior but still the powerful dominant who'd spoiled her for other lovers. Gray wants Andi desperately, but he dares not love her until she teaches him it's his mind and heart - not a perfect body - that makes him her perfect mate.
author: Ann Jacobs
